name: Paris Boat Trip
summary: Embark on a mesmerizing VR boat ride starting at the historic Notre-Dame Cathedral, gliding along the scenic banks of the Seine to the towering Eiffel Tower. Discover hidden gems of Paris on this unique journey, experience the vibrant Parisian culture, and enjoy breathtaking views. Each moment of this virtual tour is a sensory feast, filled with history, beauty, and the irresistible charm of Paris.
